mapper.select: select * from u_notify where type = 1 and id in ( select notify_id from u_user_notify where user_id = #{userId} and able_status = true ) and able_status = true order by update_time desc limit 1;

select a.id , a.read_status , a.user_id ,a.notify_id , b.content , b.type,b.target,b.target_type,b.action,b.sender,a.able_status as able_user_notify,b.able_status as able_notify,a.update_time from u_user_notify a , u_notify b where a.user_id = #{userId} and a.notify_id = b.id and a.able_status = true and b.able_status = true order by a.read_status asc,a.update_time desc;
